conversion_verification.notes: The 3D render is a consistent isometric-style cutaway of the provided plan.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness and volume. Minimal perspective distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate room configuration and wall placement. Balcony railings are simplified but present.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture layout adheres strictly to the plan, including bathroom fixtures and office desk.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Lighting is effective. Deducted slightly for minor simplified geometry in the balcony areas.

detected_errors.description: Some internal door swings from the 2D plan are rendered as open thresholds without door leaves.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect geometric and furniture layout fidelity.
